line_1: I shall soon make her know, so I shall —
line_2: And began like a bedlam to bawl,

line_1: Tell me you must and shall —
line_2: Or why you come at all.

line_1: And when the Sword of Conquest shall
line_2: Let Justice guide the equal Scale,

line_1: For more than common punishment, it shall.
line_2: It may succeed; and if his sins should call
